item.title: Enhance Your Databricks Workflow
item.description: With databricks-connect you can connect your favorite IDE to your Databricks cluster. This means that you can now lint, test, and package the code that you want to run on Databricks more easily:

item.title: Install databricks-connect
item.description: Databricks-connect allows you to connect your favorite IDE to your Databricks cluster. Install Java on your local machine. Uninstall any pyspark versions, and install databricks-connect using the regular pip commands, preventing any changes to be recorded to your virtual environment (prevents mutations to Pipfile and Pipfile.lock).
